results.content: teacher provides good info, teaches in a somewhat different style, no labels for lectures makes it hard to know where you're at or to go back and review, could use a few more explanations but it makes figure it out. overall a good course. would take another course from this instructor.

results.content:
This is a great course. Nothing is assumed in this course, and when Mohammad Tahir says from scratch, it is really from scratch. I have learned a lot in this course, starting from the CSS, designing admin panel and the use of the GET variable. There is much styling from scratch and even though the course doesn't mention CSS, if you are new to CSS, you will find a steep learning curve. The extensive use of the GET 
variable makes sure you can't miss it.  I was amazed by the content and delivery of this course, I didn't give a second thought of buying his other course.
I will strongly recommend this course to anyone wishing to enhance their knowledge and skills in PHP, Mysqli, web design and CSS,
